PsychSuite

Digital Psychology Suite

Start

Why take part in research?

  • Gain insight into your own mind
  • Gain acess to study results
  • Contribute to the understanding of psychology
  • Have acess to an [REDACTED] test, ISB, Rorschach
  • And an analaysis of results

What is involved?

  • You will be asked to complete a series of questionnaires
  • These will be used to perform a basic psychoanalytic asessment
  • You may also be asked to participate in experiments
  • You may be invited back to take part in experiments, or to retake asessments
